examples.example: 我一直记得妈妈对我的爱和付出。

translate.english: I always remember the love and dedication of my mother to me.

examples.example: 我会永远记得和朋友们一起度过的那些快乐时光。

translate.english: I will always remember those happy times spent with friends.

examples.example: 我始终记得老师对我的鼓励与期望。

translate.english: I always remember the encouragement and expectation that the teacher has for me.
